about_the_game:
Chill out on Skeeter's Grid... the Next Fest demo!

Re-connect mixed-up circuits in this 80s-inspired isometric puzzler as you move from board to board, each of increasing complexity and variation. Collect data disks and components, remnants of former grid guardians, as you rebuild each system, with the chance of additional components spawning during replays.

This demo includes the first five tutorial levels plus a bonus sandbox level exclusive to the Next Fest demo. These levels provide a sense of the core gameplay. The full version will include much larger levels plus a much wider variety of gameplay elements.
